meanings.definition: Combine or blend (two or more signals or data streams) into one.
meanings.sent1: I muxed the audio and video signals to create a single stream.
meanings.sent2: The software will mux the different data streams for better efficiency.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally muxed the wrong files together, creating a confusing mix.
meanings.sent4: Her artistic skills allow her to mux various colors into a beautiful painting.
meanings.sent5: The chef was able to mux different flavors to create a unique dish.

meanings.sent1: She muxed the ingredients in a bowl to make the batter.
meanings.sent2: The DJ will mux different songs to create a seamless mix.
meanings.sent3: The children muxed their toys together to create a new game.
meanings.sent4: The colors in the sunset muxed together in a beautiful display.
meanings.sent5: The artist will mux different textures to create a stunning sculpture.
